CYNK.summary: Cynk Technology Corp., a development stage company, focuses on operating a social network. Its social network is based on showing the types of people the user is connected with and associated. The company intends to serve seekers, who want to meet people; mavens, who know a lot of people; and targets, who are people that other people want to meet. The company was formerly known as Introbuzz, Inc. and changed its name to Cynk Technology Corp. in July 2013. Cynk Technology Corp. was founded in 2008 and is based in Belize City, Belize.
